name: Woocommerce products list and grid view
author: ikhodal team

sections.description:
It’s a beautiful plugin to show Woocommerce products list and grid view in the content blocks using shortcode or widget using ajax load more pagination option.

It supports complete responsive list and grid view of the products and best for Home and Sup-Pages with custom heading.

Features

  • Responsive products list and grid view.
  • Load more paging option.
  • Supports multiple widget.
  • Admin settings for text and background color modification.
  • Allows to show product title, price and add to cart button with product image

Buy Premium Version

  • BUY IT NOW!

Premium Version Demo

  • Click Here for a Demo

Premium Features

  • Custom settings available to hide or show product title, cart button, price, animation over image, product image, pagination, product short content and read more link.
  • Dynamic admin settings to change maximum width and height of the product images.
  • There are three type of ajax based pagination available like load more products, next-previous links and simple numeric pagination.
  • Advanced admin settings to make unlimited shortcodes.
  • Show/Hide search textfield.
  • 10+ responsive product list/grid templates.
  • 40+ beautiful product mousehover animation effects.
  • Hide/Show products of certain categories.
  • Allows to change template for the products list and grid view.
  • RTL Support.
  • Show/Hide inserted date of product.
  • Hide/Show count of the comments with products name.
  • Allows to change margin/space between products.
  • Allows to show/hide product author image and name.

Support Details

  • We do support for all the plugins and extensions, but please understand that support for premium plugins takes priority. Click here to create support ticket

sections.installation:
1. Upload and extract the zip file downloaded to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to ‘WCLM’ page from dashboard and create new shortcode to add into any page content (pro version only)
  4. Configure widgets from Appearance > Widgets and assign to page sidebar.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload and extract the zip file downloaded to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to ‘WCLM’ page from dashboard and create new shortcode to add into any page content (pro version only)
  4. Configure widgets from Appearance > Widgets and assign to page sidebar.

Can we override or change designing templates and style?

Yes, There is dynamic text and background color selection from admin panel.

Can I use multiple shortcode on the any pages?

Yes, Allows to create multiple shortcodes from the left menu “WCLM” in Pro version.

short_description: This plugin allows to show Woocommerce products list and grid view from the admin selected categories with various ajax pagination.
